name: Quadruple Tetris
description:
- - - - Q U A D R U P L E   T E T R I S - - - 

A game where you place blocks around a square and clear as many lines as possible.

It's my first game and I hope you enjoy it.

- - - - K E Y B O A R D   C O N T R O L S - - - -

W - up / soft drop

A - left / soft drop

S - down / soft drop

D - right / soft drop

Q - Rotate left

E - Rotate right

Space - hard drop 

Escape - pause/resume

- - - H I G H E S T   S C O R E S - - -

1.

2.

3.

Sent screenshot in comments if you want be here ↑

- - - - Thank you for playing!
